Introduction

Kyul is a member of the upcoming boy group IB147, they have 2 pre-debut releases out and are currently promoting in Japan, their official debut date is unknown. He has top-notch vocal skills and has a nice high-pitched vocal. Although he is good at rapping, he is said to not rap during IB147's songs for positioning reasons.

On August 4th, 2024, a Twitter account for the upcoming group L5ST was opened, revealing 4 of 5 members being former IB147 members and one being a former Daychild member. Kyul was one of the members listed.
